text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the parallelogram.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CB$ is $23$ units.
The measure of angle $BDE$ is $45$ degrees.
The length of the line $DE$ is $5$ units.
The line $BE$ is perpendicular to the line $EA$.
line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $CB$, $DB$, $BE$, $AE$, $DE$, forming a parallelogram $CBDA$ and its diagonals.
